author: adewit
body:
#### PR description:
This adds a comment in one of the TkAl configs with a setting that can be enabled to increase the OpenMP per-thread stack size that is sometimes needed for jobs to complete successfully.
Only affects MillePede alignment, no other packages.

#### PR validation:
Verified that the code runs correctly if the setting is enabled.
title: TkAl MillePede: add setting to increase OMP_STACKSIZE
